a man who behaves badly or dishonestly, especially to women: He's a cad and a bounder - I'm not in the least surprised he let you down. Synonyms
blackguard old-fashioned
bounder UK old-fashioned

CAD noun [U]
(HEART DISEASE)
medical
  specialized (also CHD) abbreviation for coronary artery disease: a condition in which arteries in the heart that supply blood to the heart muscles, become blocked

IT abbreviation for computer-aided design; computer-assisted design: the use of computers to help design products: CAD software/technology An office worker is now using a CAD system to plot production process flow, a job previously reserved only for engineers.
